type: Legendary Creature – Human Pegasus Knight Noble
rules_text:
Flying, vigilance, haste
[i]Rallying Cry[/i] – Whenever Hinoka, Warrior Princess attacks, attacking creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
[i]For Hoshido[/i] – Whenever Hinoka deals combat damage to a player, discover 3. [i](Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 3 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]I won't give up, so you can't either! [/i]
